definition: (of a bird, animal or plant) male/key/hills

sentences.english: He was particularly associated with protecting stags and subduing snakes.
sentences.chinese: 他與守護神牡鹿和征服蛇怪有密切聯繫。

sentences.english: The hounds followed the stag's scent.
sentences.chinese: 那羣獵犬循臭味追尋牡鹿。

sentences.english: Pity that the stags cannot teach swiftness to the turtles.
sentences.chinese: 真遺憾，牡鹿無法教會烏龜快走。

sentences.english: I don't reckon I'll be able to pass off a stag as a goat a second time.
sentences.chinese: 我恐怕不能第二次再用山羊去冒充牡鹿了。

sentences.english: Edmund followed the stag's trail and was soon swallowed by the fog.
sentences.chinese: 埃德蒙跟着牡鹿的蹤跡而去，很快便被迷霧吞噬了。

sentences.english: The hounds will soon hunt down the stag.
sentences.chinese: 獵狗不要多久就會追到那頭牡鹿。

sentences.english: As soon as the water drops fell on Actaeon, he was changed into a stag .
sentences.chinese: 水落在他身上後，阿卡同轉眼就變成了一隻牡鹿。

definition: (bird species of China) snowy owl (Bubo scandiacus)
